main.ts:
basic.forever(() => {
    radio.sendValue("x", input.acceleration(Dimension.X) / 10)
    basic.pause(100)
    radio.sendValue("y", input.acceleration(Dimension.Y) / 10)
    basic.pause(100)
})
basic.showIcon(IconNames.Heart)
radio.setGroup(1)
